Crystals Databank

This Databank contains entries on four hundred and ninety-seven crystals and lists their scientific, magical, ritualistic, and metaphysical propetries. This information is currently being gathered and updated as we accumulate it.


If you're interested in helping create this databank:
  • We're seeking additional sources on magical properties and use in rituals
  • Suggest any data fields we could add
  • We're facing a large backlog of scientific data that must be processed into these records
  • If you'd like to help, please join our Discord and make suggestions in the databanks -> #crystals channel
